Package ohos.global.i18n.text

Class MeasureFormatter

  • java.lang.Object
    • ohos.global.i18n.text.MeasureFormatter

  • public abstract class MeasureFormatter
extends Object
    Provides methods for formatting weights and measures.

      • format

        public abstract String format​(MeasureOptions.Unit unit,
                              double value,
                              MeasureOptions.FormatStyle formatStyle)
        Formats weights and measures based on the specified unit, value, and formatting style.
        Parameters:
        unit - Indicates the specified unit.
        value - Indicates the value of the unit.
        formatStyle - Indicates the formatting style.
        Returns:
        Returns a string representation of the formatted weights and measures.
        Since:
        5

      • format

        public abstract String format​(MeasureOptions.Unit unit,
                              double value,
                              MeasureOptions.Usage usage,
                              MeasureOptions.FormatStyle formatStyle,
                              MeasureOptions.Style style)
                       throws NotSupportConvertException
        Selects a preferred unit in the specified application scenario based on the locale of the MeasureFormatter object and formats the preferred unit according to the specified formatting style.

        If there are multiple preferred units, the style parameter determines whether to automatically select a proper one. The value of the input unit is then converted to that of the preferred unit.

        Parameters:
        unit - Indicates the input unit.
        value - Indicates the value of the unit.
        usage - Indicates the application scenario of the unit.
        formatStyle - Indicates the formatting style.
        style - Specifies whether to automatically select a proper unit.
        Returns:
        Returns the string representation of the formatted preferred unit.
        Throws:
        NotSupportConvertException - Throws this exception if any input parameter is invalid.
        Since:
        5

      • format

        public abstract String format​(MeasureOptions.Unit fromUnit,
                              double value,
                              MeasureOptions.Unit toUnit,
                              MeasureOptions.FormatStyle formatStyle)
                       throws NotSupportConvertException
        Converts the source unit to the target unit and formats the target unit according to the specified formatting style.
        Parameters:
        fromUnit - Indicates the source unit.
        value - Indicates the value of the source unit.
        toUnit - Indicates the target unit.
        formatStyle - Indicates the formatting style.
        Returns:
        Returns a string representation of the formatted target unit.
        Throws:
        NotSupportConvertException - Throws this exception if the source unit cannot be converted to the target unit.
        Since:
        5
